ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Armor choices, what is best?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I know a de SK. He uses the 1 hs weapon off inny.(bloodmoon i think its called) And a mistmoore shield so he can bash. Not much can really say about it.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I know a de SK. He uses the 1 hs weapon off inny.(bloodmoon i think its
called) And a mistmoore shield so he can bash.
Not much can really say about it. If your in a dragon fight, or fighting
casters, break out your 1 hander and shield. When your fighting tank types,
use your 2 hander. This is the #1 reason to play a large race.
But dont sweat it too much, your main thing will be the feign death pull.
Learn it, live it, know it.

----- Original Message -----
From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 11:13 AM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Armor choices, what is best?


> From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
>
> What about the Planes 1HS weapons? Also, as a DE, I will lose bash unless
I
> have a shield, not to mention alot of AC.
>
> --
> Lasombra
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steven E. Phipps [mailto:phipps@...]
> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 8:59 AM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Armor choices, what is best?
>
>
> From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>
>
> Believe me or not, Dex has no effect on the number of attacks you will
get.
> It affect critical strikes and weapon procs, thats it. (sk dont get
critical
> hits)
> Agility will effect your AC, which to me is your primary concern, AC. As i
> said, imo, go AC then STR then AGI...
> Bronze, after bronze its darkforge armor, or perhaps EB breastplate...
Then
> its umbral...
> Weapon wise go with a Bibs, then a dark reaver then a myth 2 hander...
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
> To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 10:51 AM
> Subject: [shadowknight] Armor choices, what is best?
>
>
> > From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
> >
> > <snip>
> > IMO, dex is worthless for a SK less ya got some sorta procing
weapon...Go
> AC
> > first, then STR, then agility..
> > <snip>
> >
> > Personally, Dex to me is not worthless. Anything that allows me to
strike
> > even one more time each minute is worth it. Especially with Double
Attack.
> > But that is symantics and I do not want a "word war" over it. :-)
> > I agree that raw AC comes first. Strength has more impact after 20.
> Agility
> > is up in the air for me. Not quite sure what effect it has.
> >
> >
> > What armor under Darkforge and Planes armor is best for an SK? I am
> working
> > on getting some bronze armor, and not blackened because of the lower AC.
> > What is better than bronze and what would I expect to pay for it? Or
what
> > MoB/level/zone is it in.
> > I am ignorant as to "good" items as I normally wander Norrath with my
> /ooc,
> > /auction, /shouts turned off. It is quite peaceful like this, no punk
> > kiddies acting tough and cursing each other out across the zone. But I
> > digress.
> >
> > My druid just hit 26 and I am looking into getting equipment for my SK.
> All
> > I need is to be pointed in the right direction. Any and all help is
> > appreciated.
> >
> > Thanks in advance.
> >
> > --
> > Lasombra Shadowfiend
> > 1st Tier of Hate
> > (Sitting on the newbie repop log with my newbie equip, staring at the
> murky
> > forrest)
